name: venting of argon, crude, liquid | venting of argon, crude, liquid | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/4913/documentation

This activity describes service of venting of argon into the atmosphere as an emission to air.;;Argon is produced mainly as a by-product in air separation, cryogenic activity, where oxygen, liquid is produced as a reference product. Argon is afterwards either vented directly into the atmosphere or transformed into marketable product and sold. 

This activity describes venting of argon as an emission to air.
